goals.active: Track the soldier, last seen heading northeast.
goals.complete: I followed the soldier's trail northeast along the road on the way to Black Haven. If I hurry, I can catch him before he does more harm.

goals.active: Kellach was heading to Black Haven.
goals.complete: Following Kellach's trail, I learned an important bit of information: what drives him forward is his search to find Alastia Crow. Perhaps one of the Orders knows more about her.
I discussed the next course of action with the Order representatives.
